descmd: The January 2026 Ballot Version adds [United States Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI) V6 updates](https://www.healthit.gov/isp/sites/isp/files/2025-07/USCDI-Version-6-July-2025.pdf) that the Assistant Secretary for Technology Policy (ASTP) published in July 2025. It also addresses over 50 trackers submitted by implementers since the publication of US Core ver 8.0.0. For a detailed list of the changes for this version, see the [Change Notes](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/2026Jan/changes.html).
desc: The January 2026 Ballot Version adds United States Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI) V6 updates that the Assistant Secretary for Technology Policy (ASTP) published in July 2025. It also addresses over 50 trackers submitted by implementers since the publication of US Core ver 8.0.0. For a detailed list of the changes for this version, see the Change Notes at http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/2026Jan/changes.html.
